name: The Hidden Shadows
description:
Welcome to my first 3D game (using pixel art)!

Please just take your time and enjoy...

  • doing chores around your room
  • talking to your pet fish "Todd"
  • Lämp
  • relaxing because totally nothing creepy will happen

I had a lot of fun making this game so I hope y'all enjoy it :), for this "jam" I had a lot of fun learning new techniques and stuff for scripted events and 3D unity.

Have a nice rest of your day and I hope you enjoy the 2nd game in my little universe.
